trans-unit.resname: ONS·112 | Screaming Seahawk | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: ONS·112 | Screaming Seahawk | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, you may search your library for a card named CARDNAME, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，你可从你的牌库中搜寻一张名为CARDNAME的牌，展示该牌，并置于你手上。若你如此作，将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Sea's Claim
trans-unit.target: 还诸海疆

trans-unit.resname: ONS·113 | Sea's Claim | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchanted land is an island.
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的地成为海岛。

trans-unit.source: "My vengeance will drown my enemies as my storms drown the desert."\n—Ixidor, reality sculptor
trans-unit.target: 「一如暴雨淹没荒漠，我的复仇将使敌雠窒息。」\n～实相塑师意悉多

trans-unit.source: Slipstream Eel
trans-unit.target: 滑流鳗

trans-unit.resname: ONS·114 | Slipstream Eel | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
CARDNAME can't attack unless defending player controls an island.
Cycling o1o
U (o1o
U, Discard this card from your hand: Draw a card.)
trans-unit.target: 除非防御牌手操控海岛，否则CARDNAME不能进行攻击。\n循环{1}{U}（{1}{U}，从你手上弃掉此牌：抓一张牌。）

trans-unit.source: "It's a fine way to travel, if you don't mind the smell."
trans-unit.target: 「若不在意那股味道，这倒是不错的旅行法。」

trans-unit.source: Spy Network
trans-unit.target: 情报网

trans-unit.resname: ONS·115 | Spy Network | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Look at target player's hand, the top card of that player's library, and any face-down creatures he or she controls. Look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
trans-unit.target: 检视目标牌手的手牌、该牌手的牌库顶牌，以及任意数量由该牌手所操控的牌面朝下生物。检视你牌库顶的四张牌，再将它们以任意顺序放回。

trans-unit.source: Standardize
trans-unit.target: 标准化

trans-unit.source: Choose a creature type other than Legend or Wall. Each creature's type becomes that type until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 选择一种生物类别，但不能是传奇或墙。所有生物成为该类别直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: At that point, the wizards' argument got a lot uglier.
trans-unit.target: 在这议题上，法术师的争执变得更加丑恶。

trans-unit.source: Supreme Inquisitor
trans-unit.target: 最高审判官

trans-unit.resname: ONS·117 | Supreme Inquisitor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Tap five untapped Wizards you control: Search target player's library for up to five cards and remove them from the game. Then that player shuffles his or her library.
trans-unit.target: 横置五个由你操控且未横置的法术师：从目标牌手的牌库中搜寻至多五张牌，并将该些牌移出对战。然后该牌手将他的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: "It's hard to fight on an empty mind."
trans-unit.target: 「心智干涸，难以作战。」

trans-unit.source: Trade Secrets
trans-unit.target: 商业机密

trans-unit.resname: ONS·118 | Trade Secrets | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target opponent draws two cards, then you draw up to four cards. That opponent may repeat this process as many times as he or she chooses.
trans-unit.target: 目标对手抓两张牌，然后你抓至多四张牌。该对手可将此程序重复进行任意次数。

trans-unit.source: Trickery Charm
trans-unit.target: 诡诈护符

trans-unit.resname: ONS·119 | Trickery Charm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose one Target creature gains flying until end of turn; or target creature's type becomes the creature type of your choice until end of turn; or look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～目标生物获得飞行异能直到回合结束；或者选择一种生物类别，目标生物成为该生物类别直到回合结束；或者检视你牌库顶的四张牌，再将它们以任意顺序放回。

trans-unit.source: Voidmage Prodigy
trans-unit.target: 销法师逸才

trans-unit.source:

trans-unit.resname: ONS·121 | Wheel and Deal | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wheel and Deal
trans-unit.target: 暗盘交易

trans-unit.resname: ONS·121 | Wheel and Deal | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Any number of target opponents each discards his or her hand and draws seven cards.
trans-unit.target: 任意数量的目标对手各弃掉其手牌，并抓七张牌。

trans-unit.resname: ONS·121 | Wheel and Deal | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: ONS·122 | Words of Wind | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Words of Wind
trans-unit.target: 回风箴言

trans-unit.resname: ONS·122 | Words of Wind | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: o1: The next time you would draw a card this turn, each player returns a permanent he or she controls to its owner's hand instead.
trans-unit.target: {1}：于本回合中，下一次你将抓一张牌时，改为每位牌手各将一个由他操控的永久物移回其拥有者的手上。

trans-unit.resname: ONS·122 | Words of Wind | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Be logical in all things. Do not allow instinct or passion to cloud your mind."\n—*Volume II, The Book of Insight*
trans-unit.target: 「以逻辑盱衡万物，莫使本能与激情遮蔽心灵。」\n～第二卷 洞察之书

trans-unit.source: Accursed Centaur
trans-unit.target: 受诅的半人马

trans-unit.resname: ONS·123 | Accursed Centaur | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, sacrifice a creature.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，牺牲一个生物。

trans-unit.source: "The Cabal mocks the natural order. For its minions, death is just a pause between duties."\n—Kamahl, druid acolyte
trans-unit.target: 「柯帮瞧不起自然秩序。对其党徒来说，死亡不过是任务间的休息。」\n～德鲁伊侍僧卡马尔

trans-unit.source: Anurid Murkdiver
trans-unit.target: 暗潜驽蛙

trans-unit.resname: ONS·124 | Anurid Murkdiver | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Swampwalk
trans-unit.target: 沼泽行者

trans-unit.source: Aphetto's swamps are alive with the dead.
trans-unit.target: 艾非托沼泽中充满了活蹦乱跳的死尸。

trans-unit.source: Aphetto Dredging
trans-unit.target: 艾非托式采挖

trans-unit.resname: ONS·125 | Aphetto Dredging | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return up to three target creature cards of the creature type of your choice from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 选择一种生物类别，将至多三个目标该类别的生物牌从你的坟墓场中移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: Phage became both executioner and savior, helping others to the same rebirth she had found.
trans-unit.target: 菲姬身兼处刑人与救主，协助他人获得她发现的复生方式。

trans-unit.source: Aphetto Vulture
trans-unit.target: 艾非托兀鹰

trans-unit.resname: ONS·126 | Aphetto Vulture | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: ONS·126 | Aphetto Vulture | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from play, you may put target Zombie card from your graveyard on top of your library.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME从场上进入坟墓场时，你可以将目标在你坟墓场中的灵俑牌置于你的牌库顶。

trans-unit.source: Blackmail
trans-unit.target: 勒索

trans-unit.source: Target player reveals three cards from his or her hand and you choose one of them. That player discards that card.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手从手上展示三张牌并且你从中选择一张。该牌手弃掉该牌。

trans-unit.source: Even the most virtuous person is only one secret away from being owned by the Cabal.
trans-unit.target: 只要被柯帮捉住小辫子，即使道德最高尚的人依旧会被其利用。

trans-unit.source: Boneknitter
trans-unit.target: 接骨师

trans-unit.source:
o1o
B: Regenerate target Zombie.
Morph o2o
B (You may play this face down as a 2/2 creature for o3. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
trans-unit.target: {1}{B}：重生目标灵俑。\n变身{2}{B}（你可牌面朝下地使用此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2生物。可随时支付其变身费用使其翻回正面。）

trans-unit.source: Nothing comes together as easily as it comes apart.
trans-unit.target: 东西掉下来总是比接起来容易。

trans-unit.source: Cabal Archon
trans-unit.target: 柯帮统领

trans-unit.resname: ONS·129 | Cabal Archon | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: o\nB, Sacrifice a Cleric: Target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: {B}，牺牲一个僧侣：目标牌手失去2点生命，并且你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.source: "You are weak. I am strong. The protocol is obvious."
trans-unit.target: 「你弱，我强。条约很简单。」

trans-unit.source: Cabal Executioner
trans-unit.target: 柯帮行刑人

trans-unit.resname: ONS·130 | Cabal Executioner | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, that player sacrifices a creature.
Morph o3o
Bo
B (You may play this face down as a 2/2 creature for o3. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，该牌手牺牲一个生物。\n变身{3}{B}{B}（你可牌面朝下地使用此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2生物。可随时支付其变身费用使其翻回正面。）

trans-unit.source: Cabal Slaver
trans-unit.target: 柯帮奴隶主

trans-unit.resname: ONS·131 | Cabal Slaver | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a Goblin deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card from his or her hand.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个精灵对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，该牌手从其手上弃掉一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "In its natural habitat, the goblin is stupid, yet devious. Now it's stupid, devious, and powerful."
trans-unit.target: 「依天性来说，精灵是蠢笨、狡猾的东西。现在他们是蠢笨、狡猾，又强力的东西。」

trans-unit.resname: ONS·132 | Chain of Smog | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Chain of Smog
trans-unit.target: 连锁烟雾

trans-unit.resname: ONS·132 | Chain of Smog | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player discards two cards from his or her hand. That player may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手从其手上弃掉两张牌。该牌手可以复制此咒语，并可以为其选择一个新目标。

trans-unit.resname: ONS·133 | Cover of Darkness | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cover of Darkness
trans-unit.target: 夜色掩护

trans-unit.resname: ONS·133 | Cover of Darkness | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME comes into play, choose a creature type.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进场时，选择一种生物类别。

trans-unit.resname: ONS·133 | Cover of Darkness | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Creatures of the chosen type have fear. (They can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
trans-unit.target: 该类别的生物具有恐惧异能。（这些生物只能被神器和／或黑色生物阻挡。）

trans-unit.resname: ONS·134 | Crown of Suspicion | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Crown of Suspicion
trans-unit.target: 疑心冠冕

trans-unit.resname: ONS·134 | Crown of Suspicion | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature gets +2/-1.
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物得+2/-1。

trans-unit.resname: ONS·134 | Crown of Suspicion | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice CARDNAME: Enchanted creature and other creatures that share a creature type with it get +2/-1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲CARDNAME：受此结界的生物，及与其有共通生物类别的生物均得+2/-1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: ONS·134 | Crown of Suspicion | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Darkness, hide my fear."
trans-unit.target: 「黑暗隐我疑惧。」

trans-unit.source: Cruel Revival
trans-unit.target: 残酷复生

trans-unit.resname: ONS·135 | Cruel Revival | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target non-Zombie creature. It can't be regenerated. Return up to one target Zombie card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标非灵俑的生物。它不能重生。将至多一个目标在你坟墓场中的灵俑牌移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: Few Cabal fighters fear death. They fear what follows it.
trans-unit.target: 柯帮战士不怎么怕死。他们怕的是接下来的事。

trans-unit.source: Death Match
trans-unit.target: 生死决斗

trans-unit.resname: ONS·136 | Death Match | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature comes into play, that creature's controller may have target creature of his or her choice get -3/-3 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个生物进场时，该生物的操控者可以选择一个目标生物，并让该目标生物得-3/-3直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: The Cabal breeds many things for the pit fights, but it never breeds compassion.
trans-unit.target: 柯帮为死斗竞技培育了那么多东西，却从不包括同情。

trans-unit.source: Death Pulse
trans-unit.target: 死亡脉动

trans-unit.target: 循环{2}（{2}，从你手上弃掉此牌：抓一张牌。）

trans-unit.resname: ONS·139 | Disciple of Malice | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The lantern he carried did not light his way—it signaled his approach.
trans-unit.target: 手持的提灯并非照明路径之用～而是代表他已然接近。

trans-unit.source: Doomed Necromancer
trans-unit.target: 败亡死灵术士

trans-unit.resname: ONS·140 | Doomed Necromancer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: o\nB, oc\nT, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Return target creature card from your graveyard to play.
trans-unit.target: {B}，横置，牺牲CARDNAME：将目标在你坟墓场中的生物牌移回场上。

trans-unit.source: "His sacrifice shall not be forgotten. Now toss his body over there with the others."\n—Phage the Untouchable
trans-unit.target: 「他的英勇将长存人心。好了，把他的尸体和那一堆丢在一起。」\n～不可近的菲姬

trans-unit.target: 黑锋镰刀手

trans-unit.source:
Whenever CARDNAME attacks, you lose half your life, rounded up.
Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, that player loses half his or her life, rounded up.
Morph o3o
Bo
B (You may play this face down as a 2/2 creature for o3. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你失去一半生命，小数点后进位。\n每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，该牌手失去一半生命，小数点后进位。\n变身{3}{B}{B}（你可牌面朝下地使用此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2生物。可随时支付其变身费用使其翻回正面。）

trans-unit.target: 风土病

trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to play CARDNAME, sacrifice a creature.

trans-unit.target: 若任何生物与所牺牲的生物有共通的生物类别，则消灭之。这些生物不能重生。

trans-unit.source: Entrails Feaster
trans-unit.target: 脏腑妖猫

trans-unit.resname: ONS·143 | Entrails Feaster | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may remove a creature card in a graveyard from the game. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME. If you don't, tap CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，你可以从任一坟墓场中将一张生物牌移出对战。若你如此作，则在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。若你未如此做，则横置CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: Fade from Memory
trans-unit.target: 逐渐淡忘

trans-unit.source:
Remove target card in a graveyard from the game.
Cycling o
B (o
B, Discard this card from your hand: Draw a card.)
trans-unit.target: 将目标在坟墓场中的牌移出对战。\n循环{B}（{B}，从你手上弃掉此牌：抓一张牌。）

trans-unit.resname: ONS·144 | Fade from Memory | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Proper burial is a luxury Otarians can no longer afford.
trans-unit.target: 所谓安葬，已是欧塔利亚人无福得享之事。

trans-unit.source: Fallen Cleric
trans-unit.target: 堕落僧侣

trans-unit.resname: ONS·145 | Fallen Cleric | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Protection from Clerics\nMorph o4o\nB (You may play this face down as a 2/2 creature for o3. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
trans-unit.target: 反僧侣保护\n变身{4}{B}（你可牌面朝下地使用此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2生物。可随时支付其变身费用使其翻回正面。）

trans-unit.source: The most terrifying zombies are those with just a hint of their old selves left.
trans-unit.target: 最可怕的灵俑，是那些对过往还存有一丝印象的。

trans-unit.source: False Cure
trans-unit.target: 医疗疏失

trans-unit.resname: ONS·146 | False Cure | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Until end of turn, whenever a player gains life, that player loses 2 life for each 1 life he or she gained.
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，每当任一牌手获得生命时，该牌手每获得1点生命，便失去2点生命。

trans-unit.source: "I do unto others as others have done unto me."\n—Phage the Untouchable
trans-unit.target: 「别人对我作过的事，我就让别人尝尝。」\n～不可近的菲姬

trans-unit.source: Feeding Frenzy
trans-unit.target: 饥渴追逐

trans-unit.resname: ONS·147 | Feeding Frenzy | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Zombies in play.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得-X/-X直到回合结束，X为场上灵俑的数量。

trans-unit.source: It wasn't as much a strategy as a dim instinct to drown their prey.
trans-unit.target: 依照本能蜂涌而上，根本不用动脑袋。

trans-unit.source: Festering Goblin
trans-unit.target: 溃伤精灵

trans-unit.resname: ONS·148 | Festering Goblin | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.source: Voice of the Woods
trans-unit.target: 林野唤者

trans-unit.resname: ONS·297 | Voice of the Woods | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Tap five untapped Elves you control: Put a 7/7 green Elemental creature token with trample into play.
trans-unit.target: 横置五个由你操控且未横置的地精：将一个7/7绿色，具践踏异能的元素衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.resname: ONS·297 | Voice of the Woods | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The ritual of making draws upon the elves' memories and pasts. And elves have long memories and ancient pasts.
trans-unit.target: 生成仪式赖于地精玄思各自的记忆与过往。而地精都有著绵延的记忆与漫长的过往。

trans-unit.resname: ONS·298 | Wall of Mulch | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wall of Mulch
trans-unit.target: 护根土墙

trans-unit.resname: ONS·298 | Wall of Mulch | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: (Walls can't attack.)\no\nG, Sacrifice a Wall: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: （墙不能攻击）\n{G}，牺牲一个墙：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: ONS·298 | Wall of Mulch | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Mulch is the fabric of life in the forest. Plants live in it, they die in it, and then they become part of it, feeding countless generations to come.
trans-unit.target: 护根壤是树林生态的基本单元。植物生于斯，死于斯，最终与其合一，滋养无数的下一代。

trans-unit.source: Weird Harvest
trans-unit.target: 奇异收成

trans-unit.resname: ONS·299 | Weird Harvest | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player may search his or her library for up to X creature cards, reveal those cards, and put them into his or her hand. Then each player who searched his or her library this way shuffles it.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手可以各从其牌库中搜寻至多X个生物牌，展示该些牌，然后将它们置于其手上。然后每位以此法搜寻牌库的牌手将其牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Krosa's distorted groves bear strange fruit.
trans-unit.target: 克洛萨的扭曲树丛孕育出奇特花果。

trans-unit.source: Wellwisher
trans-unit.target: 美愿祈者

trans-unit.source: oc\nT: You gain 1 life for each Elf in play.
trans-unit.target: 横置：场上每有一个地精，你便获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: "Close your ears to the voice of greed, and you can turn a gift for one into a gift for many."
trans-unit.target: 「不去聆听贪婪之声，你便能将一人之惠化为万人之福。」

trans-unit.source: Wirewood Elf
trans-unit.target: 修索林地精

trans-unit.resname: ONS·301 | Wirewood Elf | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: oc\nT: Add o\nG to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: 横置：加{G}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: "The land belongs to nature as far as our eyes can see. The higher we climb, the more we can see."
trans-unit.target: 「双眼所见之处都属于大自然。爬得愈高，能看到的也越多。」

trans-unit.source: Wirewood Herald
trans-unit.target: 修索林传令使

trans-unit.resname: ONS·302 | Wirewood Herald | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from play, you may search your library for an Elf card. If you do, reveal that card and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME从场上进入坟墓场时，你可以从牌库中搜寻一张地精牌。若你如此作，展示该牌并置于你手上。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: The goblins laughed as the elf ran away, until more came back.
trans-unit.target: 地精逃跑时，精灵嘲笑著。笑声只持续到更多地精出现为止。

trans-unit.source: Wirewood Pride
trans-unit.target: 修索林之傲

trans-unit.resname: ONS·303 | Wirewood Pride | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Elves in play.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得+X/+X直到回合结束，X为场上地精的数量。

trans-unit.source: "Though you may leave this haven we have found, may our strength never leave you."
trans-unit.target: 「即使你自此庇护地离开，我们的力量也将与你同在。」

trans-unit.source: Wirewood Savage
trans-unit.target: 修索林粗蛮人

trans-unit.resname: ONS·304 | Wirewood Savage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a Beast comes into play, you may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个野兽进场时，你可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "She is truly Wirewood's child now."\n—Elvish refugee
trans-unit.target: 「她现在真正算是修索林之子了。」\n～地精难民

trans-unit.resname: ONS·305 | Words of Wilding | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Words of Wilding
trans-unit.target: 野性箴言

trans-unit.resname: ONS·305 | Words of Wilding | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: o1: The next time you would draw a card this turn, put a 2/2 green Bear creature token into play instead.
trans-unit.target: {1}：于本回合中，下一次你将抓一张牌时，改为将一个2/2绿色熊衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.resname: ONS·305 | Words of Wilding | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Instinct is undaunted by terror, unchained by logic. It is the path from which all other paths diverge."\n—*Volume V, The Book of Life*
trans-unit.target: 「本能不为恐惧所凌，不为逻辑所抑。此即众径之本。」\n～第五卷 生机之书

trans-unit.source: Cryptic Gateway
trans-unit.target: 隐密闸门

trans-unit.resname: ONS·306 | Cryptic Gateway | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Tap two untapped creatures you control: You may put a creature card from your hand into play that shares a creature type with each creature tapped this way.
trans-unit.target: 横置两个由你操控且未横置的生物：只要该生物牌与所横置的生物间有共通的生物类别，你便可以将此生物牌从手上放置进场。

trans-unit.source: Its lock changes to fit each key.
trans-unit.target: 其锁孔会照不同钥匙而改变。

trans-unit.target: 轰杀大炮

trans-unit.source: Dream Chisel

trans-unit.source: Itself a product of Ixidor's tortured psyche, the chisel brings his darkest dreams to life.
trans-unit.target: 意悉多饱经磨折的心灵造出了它，让他最黑暗的梦想成真。
